snippet: Google has enhanced the encryption technology for its flagship email service in ways that will make it harder for the National Security Agency to intercept messages moving among the company's worldwide data centers....

headline.print_headline: Google Enhances Encryption Technology for Email
headline.main: Google Enhances Encryption Technology for Email

lead_paragraph: Google has enhanced the encryption technology for its flagship email service in ways that will make it harder for the National Security Agency to intercept messages moving among the company's worldwide data centers.
